ComicInfo.Summary:
Halloween Hanging!
After a grisly mishap in a Halloween haunted house, a young man finds himself haunted by demonic specters. Wondering if he's going insane, or if he is truly being followed by something sinister, he turns to his friends... but what he discovers will uncover a shocking and chilling truth. This Halloween, Grimm Tales of Terror is more terrifying than ever!
